title: Man arrested for molesting woman as she walked home in Tokyo
text:
Police in Tokyo have arrested a 40-year-old man on suspicion of molesting a woman in her 20s as she walked home in Itabashi Ward in August.

According to police, the suspect, Jun Tsuchiya, a company employee from Nerima Ward, has admitted to the charge, Fuji TV reported. Police said Tsuchiya came up behind the woman just before dawn on Aug 1. After grabbing her, he dragged her onto the premises of an apartment building, dropped his pants and started groping her breasts.

Police quoted Tsuchiya, who was identified through street surveillance camera footage, as saying the woman was his type and he wanted to embrace her.
